subject: Volleyball
lead_paragraph: The United States stayed in first place with a comfortable 25-20, 25-13, 25-21 win over Egypt in Hiroshima, Japan, at the men’s volleyball World Cup.
snippet: The United States stayed in first place with a comfortable 25-20, 25-13, 25-21 win over Egypt in Hiroshima, Japan, at the men’s volleyball World Cup.
